tweet: Fan your copier paper first. It helps separate every sheet to minimise misfeeds / jamming.
Always store copy paper flat, not on its edge, to minimise copying problems.
Clean copier glass with methylated spirits. Gives better results than glass cleaner.
Levelling a photocopier can prevent paper jams.
Use the correct transparency film for your printer or photocopier. Some films melt and repairs are expensive.
